special_text:
Sacrifice a nonblocking creature: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Kamden by the source of your choice this turn.
[+1]: Create a 0/1 white Serf creature token.
[-2]: Each player sacrifices a creature.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.” Then destroy all creatures.
